Summary: Generating random colors, pulsating, changing direction, stationary at times.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Woodland
There were no other sightings in Woodland on or around February 9th 2013
divs: sighting detailssaturday, 2\9\13 at 6:05pm. i was bbq in my backyard, noticed a purple light in the sky to the east heading west.. the light went stationary and started pulsating different colors. they ranged from purple, blue, green, orange and yellow. the object proceeded south, stopped and than started to head north all while changing colors. stopped again, hovered for about 25 seconds than proceeded west torwards my direction. i ran in the house and told my wife to come out and take a look. her responce was holy s***. she than ran in the house to tell my son and also his friend. we all saw the object. the object had to be less then a mile away before heading east torwards sacramento. lost visual in the tress. approx 5min. later a plane flew by in the same direction as the object moving a lot faster. i heard the plane this other thing no sound at all with an amazing display of pulsating lights.
